body_html:
@DanielaSchacherer Are you using Python 3.6? What about updating your Python version to 3.6.2? The issue is about dependencies. The full dependency list is listed as below. You can check it one by one by using something like where xxx.dll.

# Not included in the package, these should be under Anaconda/Python dir
# Windows  10 SDK files version: 10.0.10240.16384
api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-stdio-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-heap-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-convert-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-string-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-locale-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-math-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-multibyte-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-filesystem-l1-1-0.dll
# Kernel file version: 10.0.16299.15, this one lies in C:\Windows\system32
KERNEL32.dll                          
# Python36 file version: 3.6.2150.1013, in Anaconda/Python dir
python36.dll
# Python35 file version: 3.5.3150.1013, in Anaconda/Python dir     
python35.dll

# Included in the package, no need to check
shm.dll
nvrtc64_90.dll / nvrtc64_80.dll 
nvcuda.dll
cudart64_90.dll / cudart64_80.dll
nvToolsExt64_1.dll
cudnn64_7.dll / cudnn64_6.dll
ATen.dll

body:
@DanielaSchacherer Are you using Python 3.6? What about updating your Python version to 3.6.2? The issue is about dependencies. The full dependency list is listed as below. You can check it one by one by using something like `where xxx.dll`.
```
# Not included in the package, these should be under Anaconda/Python dir
# Windows  10 SDK files version: 10.0.10240.16384
api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-stdio-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-heap-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-convert-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-string-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-locale-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-math-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-multibyte-l1-1-0.dll
api-ms-win-crt-filesystem-l1-1-0.dll
# Kernel file version: 10.0.16299.15, this one lies in C:\Windows\system32
KERNEL32.dll                          
# Python36 file version: 3.6.2150.1013, in Anaconda/Python dir
python36.dll
# Python35 file version: 3.5.3150.1013, in Anaconda/Python dir     
python35.dll

# Included in the package, no need to check
shm.dll
nvrtc64_90.dll / nvrtc64_80.dll 
nvcuda.dll
cudart64_90.dll / cudart64_80.dll
nvToolsExt64_1.dll
cudnn64_7.dll / cudnn64_6.dll
ATen.dll
```
